casebody.data:
First District.

Illinois Standard Manufacturing Company, appellee, v. Ernest Reich and Henry Blech, appellants.Gen. No. 34,476.Heard in the first division of this court for the first district at the June term, 1930.Opinion filed June 18, 1930.Louis Greenberg and Herman Herson, for appellants. Frank H. T. Potter and Haight, Adcock & Banning, for appellee; Charles E. Lewis, of counsel. Mr. Presiding Justice Matchett

delivered the opinion of the court.
